remarks: Deduction doubly quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90 ( ~ alim ).  (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2019.)
statement:
ralimdvva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
ralimdvva $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ps -> A. x e. A A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph x y $.
